last_episode_to_air.name: A Sneeze in Time
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sneezy accidentally sneezes the other 7D a week into the future.

name: The 7D
overview: The 7D is an American animated television series produced by Disney Television Animation loosely based on the 1937 film Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs by Walt Disney Productions where The 7D must defend the land of Jollywood from the magical villains Grim and Hildy Gloom who attempt to dethrone Queen Delightful and rule Jollywood.

episodes.name: Long, Long Winter
episodes.overview: The 7D work to remove the Glooms' eternal winter spell cast on the Jollywood villagers while looking for the Spring Chicken to help end winter.

episodes.name: Itsy Bitsy Spider Fighters
episodes.overview: The 7D assist Queen Delightful in removing a pesky spider from the castle.

episodes.name: Sneezin' Season
episodes.overview: Sneezy's sneezes intensify and the 7D worry he may be allergic to Grumpy.

episodes.name: The Delightful Diamond Mystery
episodes.overview: When Queen Delightful’ s Delightful Diamond goes missing, the 7D join forces with the Magic Mirror to solve the mystery.

episodes.name: Mirror, Mirror
episodes.overview: Queen Delightful's Magic Mirror goes missing and is replaced with an impostor.

episodes.name: The Big Bash
episodes.overview: Bashful tries to stop Gloom's plan to steal Queen Delightful's new golden sky bucket.

episodes.name: Surprise
episodes.overview: A surprise party is planned for Queen Delightful.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Neighborhood
episodes.overview: The Glooms disguise themselves as the 7D's new neighbors to gain access to the jewel mine.

episodes.name: Sir Yipsalot and the Goose
episodes.overview: The Glooms kidnap Queen Delightful's royal dog.

episodes.name: Starchy Takes a Break
episodes.overview: Grumpy is named Lord Starchbottom's replacement when he suffers an injury.

episodes.name: The Littlest Giants
episodes.overview: A giant terrorizes Jollywood, so Queen Delightful calls upon the 7D to save the kingdom.

episodes.name: Gnome Alone
episodes.overview: Sleepy tries to stop the Glooms from breaking into the jewel mine and stealing the Royal Ruby, after he is accidentally left behind when the 7D go on vacation.

episodes.name: Sleepytime
episodes.overview: Hildy casts a sleeping spell that puts everyone in Jollywood into a deep sleep.

episodes.name: Goldilocks and the 7D
episodes.overview: Goldilocks is chased by three bears and seeks refuge in the 7D's cottage.

episodes.name: For the Love of Cheese
episodes.overview: A magical love spell causes Hildy to fall in love with Grumpy and threatens to ruin his Cheese Day holiday.

episodes.name: Let's Get Organ-ized
episodes.overview: The 7D repair Queen Delightful's pipe organ.

episodes.name: Grandpa Grumpy & the Ogre
episodes.overview: Grumpy and Happy join their eccentric grandfathers on a journey to recover a priceless gem.

episodes.name: Fairest in the Land
episodes.overview: The Glooms cast a spell on Queen Delightful to turn her into a troll to insure Hildy's victory as "fairest in the land" at the annual Jolly Awards.

episodes.name: The 8th D
episodes.overview: Dopey tries to disguise his new pet elephant as a dwarf.

episodes.name: New Shoe
episodes.overview: The 7D build a new home for the Old Woman Who Lives in a Shoe.

episodes.name: Bathtub Bashful
episodes.overview: When Jenny Jollywood comes down with a frog in her throat before the Jollypalooza concert, Queen Delightful wants Bashful to sing at the Jollypalooza concert after hearing him singing in the shower. The other 7D must find a way to enable Bashful to sing at the Jollypalooza concert without him getting shy.

episodes.name: Knick Knack Paddy Whack
episodes.overview: The 7D return from the Enchanted Sea with the Pearl of Wisdom (a pearl which can grant anyone wisdom) within a crystal oyster which they give to Queen Delightful. In order to answer the riddle for a witch's contest, Hildy and Grim plan to steal the Peal of Wisdom from Queen Delightful's Knick Knack Room.

episodes.name: Grim The Dragon
episodes.overview: After seeing a black dragon attack Jollywood, Grim transforms into a dragon to wreck havoc, only to be taken away by the dragon.

episodes.name: Free Teensy
episodes.overview: Hildy gets a ring that lets her transform into any animal and Grim takes her to the carnival to celebrate, where Hildy changes into a mouse and loses  the ring inside a fish the queen wins in a game. Meanwhile, the fish keeps growing and growing in size.

episodes.name: The Jollywood Jam
episodes.overview: As the 7D celebrate Hero's Day with a musical masterpiece, the Glooms try to ruin it with a mind-reading wand, only to accidentally switch it with Happy's conductor wand.

episodes.name: Hildy The Good
episodes.overview: Geting annoyed at always losing, Hildy pretends to become good to get everyone to like her and allow her to take over the kingdom.

episodes.name: Buckets
episodes.overview: The 7D travel to a haunted mansion by the sea to recover the Queen's missing childhood keepsakes.

episodes.name: Frankengloom
episodes.overview: When the Glooms create a terrifying monster to drive Queen Delightful out of her castle, their plan backfires as Queen Delightful decides to befriend the monster instead.

episodes.name: Uncle Humidor
episodes.overview: When Queen Delightful's zany Uncle Humidor visits and takes the 7D along on his quest to find the rarest bird in all of Jollywood, the bird mistakes Grumpy for one of its chicks and refuses to let him go.

episodes.name: Grim the Genius
episodes.overview: When Grim magically turns into a genus and is successful in his attempt to outwit the 7D and overthrow the queen, Hildy is delighted until she finds that Grim's new-found intelligence makes him less attentive to her.

episodes.name: The Enchanted Shoes
episodes.overview: Grim and Hildy disguise themselves as cobblers and cast a shoe spell on the villagers of Jollywood to run them all out of town.

episodes.name: Hildyrella
episodes.overview: Hildy faces off against her arch-nemesis Snazzy Shazam in the Ultimate Supreme Sorceress Pageant.

episodes.name: Big Bad Sneezy
episodes.overview: Sneezy meets the Big Bad Wolf who tricks him into blowing down the houses of the Three Little Pigs.

episodes.name: Cat on a Hot Grim Roof
episodes.overview: After Grim gets Hildy an adorable white cat, rather than a witchy black cat like she wants, Hildy tries to get rid of it but the cat keeps coming back.

episodes.name: Gingersnaps and Grumpy Snaps
episodes.overview: Grumpy saves an elf named Gingersnap from drowning who in return, vows to act as Grumpy’s servant for the rest of his life.

episodes.name: Jollybells
episodes.overview: Happy must figure out a plan to bring the holiday spirit back to the villagers of Jollywood after the Glooms drain the joy out of the town using a magical.

episodes.name: The Very Important Thingy
episodes.overview: Queen Delightful has Doc invent a Thingy so that her upcoming announcement can be heard even in the next kingdom over. While Doc tries to find someplace quiet to concentrate on the plans for the Thingy which leads to him working on the plans in the Tranquil Desert, the other 7D turn to Lord Starchbottom to teach them how to be quiet. When Doc's Thingy is finally created, Queen Delightful's invention impresses the ruler of the next kingdom over to have a Thingy made to respond to Queen Delightful's announcements.

episodes.name: Leaf It to Sneezy
episodes.overview: During Autumn, Grumpy and Happy use Sneezy to blow leaves to Queen Delightful's Jumpity-Jump-Jump-Jaroo Fall into Fall Day. When Hildy Gloom creates a Leaf Monster to take Queen Delightful to Gusty Gorge (a tornado-filled location where the North, South, East, and West meet), she gives Sneezy amsneezia (a condition where the person can't remember how to sneeze) so that his sneeze can't blow away her Leaf Monster. While the others try to stall the Leaf Monster, Doc takes Sneezy to the enchanted bowling alley called Memory Lane run by Jack Flashback in order to find the bowling ball containing the knowledge to sneeze and knock down the pins.

episodes.name: 7 Frogs
episodes.overview: When a witch casts a spell that turns all of the villagers of Jollywood into frogs, The 7D must hop into action and track down the witch to reverse the spell.

episodes.name: Sir Yipsalot and the Mutt
episodes.overview: Sir Yipsalot and a look-alike stray dog lead The 7D on a wild chase of mistaken identity throughout Jollywood.

episodes.name: The Queen's Quest
episodes.overview: After Hildy disguises herself as the Magic Mirror and sends the queen away on a dangerous quest, the 7D must go after her and bring her back to the throne.

episodes.name: Finders Keepers
episodes.overview: Grumpy and Grim Gloom become unlikely allies to rescue their pets - Giselle the Goat and Peaches the Warthog - from a troll named Finders-Keepers.

episodes.name: Abraca-Dopey
episodes.overview: While performing a magic trick, Dopey turns his assistant, Sleepy, into a wild bear.

episodes.name: Doing the 7D Dance
episodes.overview: The 7D invent a new dance craze that sweeps Jollywood and the entire Enchanted Forest.

episodes.name: Big Rock Candy Flim-Flam
episodes.overview: When the clock on Tick Tock Mountain breaks, The 7D must replace its giant crystal in time for Grandmommers Whimsical's Friday night visit with Queen Delightful.

episodes.name: Bing Bong Beans!
episodes.overview: When the Bing Bong Bell keeps ringing, The 7D travel up the beanstalk to the Cloud Kingdom and encounter a giant.

episodes.name: Rock of Sages
episodes.overview: In an epic quest to rescue Jollywood, The 7D must travel to the far corners of the globe to gather seven magic stones, which when combined form the Rock of Sages, the source of all magic.

episodes.name: When Pigs Fly
episodes.overview: The 7D must stop a group of flying pigs from eating all the food in Jollywood.

episodes.name: Knight School
episodes.overview: When Sir Charmsalot makes the queen swoon, Bashful and Grumpy go to Knight School to become knights.

episodes.name: In Yer Dreams, Pal
episodes.overview: Nocturna places a night spell on Jollywood and she kidnapped The Sandman and Sunny the Sun Sprite.

episodes.name: The Great Glitterpillar
episodes.overview: A Glitterpillar goes after the queen's gems while Hildy becomes a sixty-foot tall giantess to take over the kigndom.

episodes.name: Oh Happy Grumpy
episodes.overview: Grumpy is cursed so he'll turn into a pile of melted cheese if he ever utters a mean word again.

episodes.name: Funniest Haircut Day
episodes.overview: Grumpy goes into hiding to avoid Funniest Haircut Day as the Glooms tried to steal everyone's hair to take over the kingdom with a spell.

episodes.name: Say Pest to the Dress
episodes.overview: Wild animals have taken over the the Queen's closet and the 7D get them out, but then the Glooms fill the castle up with vermin..

episodes.name: Delight Me, Delight Me Not
episodes.overview: The Glooms go after Delightium, the only gem in the world that can remove all of Queen Delightful's delightfulness.

episodes.name: Whose Voice Is It Anyway?
episodes.overview: To win a bet against Grumpy to not sing, Happy gets his voice taken by Echo Valley for a day. When he goes to get it back, he ends up with Grim Gloom's voice.

episodes.name: Take Your Pet to Lunch Day
episodes.overview: Sneezy is sad since his allergies keep him from having a pet to take to the party, but he befriends a hairless griffin that needs some training.

episodes.name: Giggleberries
episodes.overview: Happy gets a serious case of the giggles when he eats some Giggleberries, and Grumpy and Dopey set off to find the antidote.

episodes.name: Jolleyball Anyone?
episodes.overview: Queen Delightful hires the world’s greatest coach, Coach Coachy, to lead the 7D to victory in the annual Jolleyball game. *Jim Belushi (“According to Jim”) guest stars as Coach Coachy.

episodes.name: Miss Fortune Teller
episodes.overview: To prevent bad luck, the Queen seeks the advice of a fortune teller.

episodes.name: Grump-Tiki
episodes.overview: Grumpy and the 7D set sail on the Grump-Tiki to Piquant Island in search of the stinkiest cheese in the world.

episodes.name: You Ain’t Seen Nothin’ Yeti!
episodes.overview: After Hildy casts a spell on the 7D that turns them into mimes, Grumpy leads the group on a dangerous mission to retrieve their lost voices from the Cave of the Yeti.

episodes.name: Which Witch is Which?
episodes.overview: When Grim borrows Hildy’s duplicating wand, he accidentally creates a Hildy clone.

episodes.name: The Family Pickles
episodes.overview: When a pickle shortage plagues Jollywood, THE 7D travel to a pickle farm to help save the day.

episodes.name: Chicken Soup for the Troll
episodes.overview: When the Queen comes down with a case of Yodeladyflu, THE 7D set off to find the cure.

episodes.name: Dr. Jingleheimer
episodes.overview: While picking flowers late at night Doc is captured by the evil scientsitst Dr. Jingleheimer who plans on using his hat to shrink all of Jollywood, for his model train set and now it's up to Happy and Grumpy to rescue him.

episodes.name: The Enchanted Forest Ranger
episodes.overview: Grumpy is determined to earn a Dragon Scout badge, but he must first deal with the rule-crazed Enchanted Forest Ranger,and his absured rules are driving the rest of the 7D crazy,including Sneezy.

episodes.name: Take Me to Your Grumpy
episodes.overview: Two timid aliens seek Grumpy's expertise in "grumpitude."

episodes.name: Nicely Done & the 7D
episodes.overview: The 7D team up with the dashing Nicely Done when one of their own is captured by the Sheriff of Plottingham.

episodes.name: Smarty Tooth
episodes.overview: The 7D must work together to get Doc's Smarty Tooth back.

episodes.name: Surely, You Jest
episodes.overview: The Queen decides to hire a court jester and the Glooms suggest their Crystal Ball.

episodes.name: Hop To It, Dopey!
episodes.overview: While trying to stop Little Bunny Foo Foo from bopping the field mice, Dopey stumbles into the lair of Jollywood’s most powerful Sorcerer.

episodes.name: What Are You, Five?
episodes.overview: Hildy casts a spell that turns the 7D into five-year-olds.

episodes.name: Bedknobs and Gloomsticks
episodes.overview: When termites infest the queen's castle, keeping her up all night, the 7D build a new bed for her to sleep on.

episodes.name: Take Care of Your Elf
episodes.overview: Every elf in Jollywood quit their job thanks to Grumpy's temper, so now Grumpy must apologize to the elf king while the others take over the work.

episodes.name: 7D and the Beast
episodes.overview: At his family reunion, Grumpy is hailed as a hero and leader of the 7D.

episodes.name: Game of Grumpy
episodes.overview: Doc and the gang set out to solve the mystery of the missing Baroness Bonbon.

episodes.name: Bummer Vacation
episodes.overview: Trouble ensues when the Glooms and the 7D vacation at the same seaside resort.

episodes.name: They Growl by Night
episodes.overview: When a grizzly bear goes missing, it’s up to Dopey and Grumpy to solve the mystery.

episodes.name: The Jollywood Games
episodes.overview: Bashful and Grim battle in the Jollywood Games for the coveted grand prize – to have a request granted by Queen Delightful.

episodes.name: Planks, But No Planks
episodes.overview: When Trolls charge a huge toll to cross Doc’s new bridge, Doc must find a way to circumvent his own oversight.

episodes.name: Shapeshifter
episodes.overview: With a villainous Shapeshifter on the loose, it’s up to Agent Bash to save Jollywood from his evil schemes.

episodes.name: There’s A Monkey In My Hat
episodes.overview: The Queen’s advisor, Squire Peckington, goes on vacation and is replaced by a monkey in the Queen’s hat.

episodes.name: Once in a Purple Moon
episodes.overview: When a rare moon event causes Happy and Grumpy to turn into something awful, they try to hide from the others.

episodes.name: Water Ya Doin’, Dopey?
episodes.overview: After Hildy botches her new aging spell and turns herself and the Queen into old ladies, the 7D search for The Fountain of Youth.

episodes.name: A Royal Pain in the Castle
episodes.overview: Grumpy gets put in charge of the kingdom for the day, and accidentally offends the king of the Gnomes.

episodes.name: A Sneeze in Time
episodes.overview: Sneezy accidentally sneezes the other 7D a week into the future.
